SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AutomaticGame
The AutomaticGame class represents an automatic game of the Towers of Hanoi.
ComputerSolvedController
The ComputerSolvedController class is responsible for displaying the computer's solution statistics.
ComputerSolvedView
The ComputerSolvedView class is responsible for displaying the computer's solutions statistics screen of the Towers of Hanoi game.
DatabaseConnection<T>
The DatabaseConnection interface defines the methods for connecting to a database, performing various operations, and extracting data from the database.
Game
The Game class is an abstract class that represents a Towers of Hanoi game.
LogInController
The LogInController class is responsible for controlling the login screen.
LogInView
The LogInView class is responsible for displaying the Log In screen of the Towers of Hanoi game.
Main
 
MenuController
The MenuController class is responsible for controlling the main menu screen.
MenuView
The MenuView class is responsible for displaying the menu screen of the Towers of Hanoi game.
MongoDBConnection
The MongoDBConnection class represents a connection to a MongoDB database.
MySQLConnection
This class represents a connection to a MySQL database and implements the DatabaseConnection interface.
OptionsController
The OptionsController class is responsible for controlling the options screen.
OptionsView
The OptionsView class is responsible for displaying the game's options screen of the Towers of Hanoi game.
PlayController
 
PlayerGame
The PlayerGame class represents a game of Towers of Hanoi played by a player.
PlayView
The PlayView class is responsible for displaying the play screen of the Towers of Hanoi game.
SettingsController
The SettingsController class is responsible for controlling the user's account information.
SettingsView
The SettingsView class is responsible for displaying the user's account settings screen of the Towers of Hanoi game.
SignUpController
The SignUpController class handles the functionality of the sign-up view in the Towers of Hanoi application.
SignUpView
The SignUpView class is responsible for displaying the sign-up screen of the Towers of Hanoi game.
StatisticsController
The StatisticsController class handles the functionality of the statistics view in the Towers of Hanoi application.
StatisticsData<T>
The StatisticsData class is used for adding user data to the table with the best 10 performances of the users.
StatisticsView
The StatisticsView class is responsible for displaying a table with the 10 best performances of the users.
TutorialController
The TutorialController class handles the functionality of the automatic game in the Towers of Hanoi application.
TutorialThread
The TutorialThread class represents a thread that displays the automatic game (computer's solution).
TutorialView
The TutorialView class is responsible for displaying the computer's solution of the Towers of Hanoi game.
User
The User class represents a user and provides methods to update user data from different databases.
UserSolvedController
The UserSolvedController class handles the functionality of the user solved view in the Towers of Hanoi application.
UserSolvedView
The UserSolvedView class is responsible for displaying the user's solution statisitcs.
